title: Art Deco Emporium Single E27 Lampholder in Black Bakelite with Shade Ring and Metal Cord Grip for Hanging Light Fittings, Black Ceiling Light Fitting or Pendant Light Fitting
features: Intergrated saftey lock to prevent the lampholder opening when you change the bulb. We remove the central locking disk and package this separately with instructions to unlock if needed.

Use this black lamp bulb holder with our black ceiling rose and braided twisted flex to make a vintage black ceiling pendant light fitting. Alternatively, it can be used to make or repair a table lamp
Create your own bottle lamp kit, vintage lamp, light pendant fitting or any hanging lamp with this classic Bakelite E27 bulb holder. All black Bakelite construction not requiring an earth wire.
Shade ring and half threaded body to provide secure lamp shade fixing. A 10mm metal threaded and lockable cable entry will secure this lampholder to your chosen project needing black light fittings

Made to exacting standards for the Art Deco Emporium, fully CE/UKCA marked. 230Volts 4Amps. Internal screw terminals. For threaded Edison screw ES27/E27 GLS LED, carbon filiment, dimmable or not bulbs
description: Art Deco Emporium Single E27 Lampholder in Black Bakelite with Shade Ring and Metal Cord Grip for Hanging Light Fittings, Black Ceiling Light Fitting or Pendant Light Fitting Top quality Edison screw E27 bulb holder made from durable black Bakelite thermoplastic. Supplied with a shade ring suitable for use on standing lamps. One lamp holder consists of: 39mm half-threaded barrel for Edison Screw cap bulbs Lamp shade ring 57mm at widest part Separate internal electrical connections with traditional screw terminal blocks AUTO-LOCKING safety screw-on lid 10mm threaded metal locking cord entry Suitable for 220-250 volts ~ 4Amp capacity, 60 Watts NOTES: This item does not require grounding via earth connection. Shade hole diameter required; between 40mm - 55mm. We provide access to un-locking instruction with every unit supplied. Art Deco Emporium Ltd. provides full UK support to all our customers via email or telephone. Art Deco Emporium Ltd are a UK Born and Bred limited company based in glorious South Wales in the county of Caerphilly. We specialise in vintage reproductions and renovations of domestic electrical products. If you have any questions or issues with your order then please contact us in the first instance and we will do everything within our power to assist.
